el:protected.el:luamain:
rooms_wide=1 rooms_high=1
levelw=1+(19*rooms_wide) levelh=1+(12*rooms_high)
create_world( levelw, levelh)
fill_floor("fl-metal", 0,0,levelw,levelh)
function renderLine( line, pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c = strsub( pattern, i, i) if c =="#" then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", i-1, line) elseif c == "o" then oxyd( i-1, line) elseif c=="w" then set_actor("ac-whiteball-small", i-.5,line+.5, {player=0, mouseforce=1, essential=1}) elseif c=="H" then hollow(i-1,line) elseif c=="h" then set_item("it-hill",i-1,line) elseif c == "d" then --1-d set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=1}) elseif c == "u" then --2-u set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=2}) elseif c == "r" then --3-r set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=3}) elseif c == "l" then --4-l set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=4}) elseif c == "1" then --ur set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=11}) elseif c == "3" then --dl set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=9}) elseif c == "7" then --dr set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=12}) elseif c == "9" then --ul set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=10}) end end end
-- Floor: " " -- Border: "#" -- Oxyd: "o"
renderLine(00,"####################") renderLine(01,"#H#3lllhhlll # lrl #") renderLine(02,"#d#d######## #d###u#") renderLine(03,"# #d# rlrl #H# # h #") renderLine(04,"# #d#u####d### #u###") renderLine(05,"#h# #H#wwlll # l1#") renderLine(06,"#d#####d#ww#####d#u#") renderLine(07,"#9rlrrr #wwl1#Hr #u#") renderLine(08,"#######d####u#####u#") renderLine(09,"#H# r # llr9h77#3r7#") renderLine(10,"#d#u#d########u#u###") renderLine(11,"# r # rllrrlrrh# H#") renderLine(12,"####################")
